author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1705776134}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1681987095}
review:
Fallen is a 2D retro platformer and unabashed ripoff of the highly successful puzzle platformer, Limbo, right down to the dark foreground/coloured background theme distinctive of the game (and that's been ripped off by so many "amateur" hacks since, because it's easy to do, and "amateur" developers are lazy).  Of course this one is terrible, and it's pretty close to being an asset flip.  It was slapped together with some sprites and tiles that were presumably ripped off the internet somewhere, and bolted together with the code-free point-and-click ClickTeam Fusion construction kit... no actual game development took place on this train wreck. 

From a technical perspective, the game doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

There's no options to change the resolution for the game or customise the graphics settings.  There's no way for gamers to ensure this is running at the native resolution of their displays... there's no guarantee this game will look right on any PC as a result of this hamfisted design decision.  There's no way for gamers to try improve the low quality graphics. 

The game features simple, cartoony 2D graphics, of the type you normally expect to see in low effort mobile apps.  3D graphics programming does require a degree of skill and competence and unfortunately not all developers have the budget or talent to deliver this, despite 3D graphics cards hitting the mainstream in the 1990's.  Considering this is being evaluated as a PC game, having the graphics phoned in like this isn't going to result in a high quality, visually impressive game that PC gamers are used to seeing.

The controls can't be customised, which will be an annoyance for many, but it can also render the game unplayable for differently-abled gamers.

Some of the defects in the game can be attributed to the choice of using the Clickteam Fusion construction kit - the "No-Code" construction kit that "Anyone can make games with!!".  Including, you know, people who aren't game developers.  Which is a problem.  This is a very poor quality toolset sometimes used by amateur developers as it's free (so they don't have to pay for GameMaker Studio) and doesn't require advanced game development skills, but unfortunately has very limited capabilities (it's arguably worse than GameMaker Studio).  Just as you can't make a silk purse out of a sows ear, you can't make a great video game if you use a terrible engine.

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

You don't have to take my word about how bad the game is, we can measure the interest in a game by how much people bothered to play it.  Fallen has achievements, and they show us a very clear picture that the game absolutely failed to capture any interest from gamers.  The most commonly and easily attained achievement is for "meeting a ghost" (something that happens in the first few minutes of the game), but less than 3 percent of players bothered to get that far before uninstalling the game.  That's a tiny, tiny proportion of gamers who even bothered with this.  Ouch.

Reviewing SteamDB to check how popular this game was with players reveals a surprise... there's a very healthy spike in player counts for the game.  But this isn't consistent with the achievement stats, that show less than 3 percent of players bothered playing the game for any reasonable amount of time.  How is it possible for this game to have so many concurrent players who weren't even playing the game?  Trading cards.  Players will use card idling software to collect the cards and sell them, but this won't trigger any achievements in-game.  That tells us people only really bought this game for trading cards, and that's a damning indictment of the woeful quality.  A closer look at the numbers shows the game just has a couple of players every week running up the game and idling it for cards, then deleting it.  We must ask how it benefits gamers for there to be so many games like this, with no merit as a serious game, that only generate sales from people idling and selling the trading cards.

Fallen is relatively cheap at $2 USD, but it's not worth it. Given the defects and quality issues with the game, coupled with the unrealistic price, this is impossible to recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 650, 'last_played': 1665852775}
review:
"Fallen" ist ein Jump and Run-Spiel.

Unser Sohn ist in eine Felsspalte gefallen. Also machen wir uns auf den Weg durch dunkle Höhlen, um ihn wiederzufinden. Im Untergrund leben allerdings zahlreiche Monster, Geister und Tiere, die uns ans Leder wollen. Immerhin haben wir eine Schußwaffe debei. Und auch zahlreiche Fallen wie spitze Vorsprünge oder herunterfallende Felsen, machen uns zu schaffen. 

"Fallen" funktioniert grundsätzlich wie ein typisches Jump and Run. Wir müssen Gegner abwehren, Fallen ausweichen, Türen mit Hebeln öffnen und auf dem Weg zahlreiche schwebende Kristalle einsammeln. Hin und wieder warten auch Bossgegner auf uns. 

Das große Problem des Titels ist sein frustrierender Schwierigkeitsgrad, der allerdings gar nicht mal aus den Aktionen selber, sondern aus viel zu langen Leveln ohne Checkpoints resultiert. Durch farbige Kristalle können wir uns zwar an Ort und Stelle respawnen. Die sind aber extrem selten und viel zu schnell aufgebraucht. Und so spielen wir denn gerne mal zwanzig Minuten und müssen dann wieder von vorne anfangen, weil wir eine der schwer zu erkennenden Fallen übersehen haben. 

Die Ästhetik, die alles im Vordergrund schwarz darstellt und den Hintergrund dafür farbig macht, ist zwar schick und künstlerisch durchaus gelungen, sie trägt aber nicht gerade zur Erkennbarkeit von Strukturen und Fallen bei. Im Gegenteil: gerne verschmilzt mal alles in einer einzigen schwarzen Fläche. 

Hinzu kommt noch, daß die Hitboxen oft viel größer sind als ihre optische Repräsentation. So können wir zum Beispiel durch sich bewegende Ninja-Sterne getötet werden, auch wenn diese uns optisch nicht mal annähernd berührt haben. 

Wer mit diesen Frustfaktoren leben kann, findet ein schickes und ansonsten auch recht gut gebautes Jump & Run.  

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
7/10 Atmosphäre
7/10 Story
7/10 Grafik
6/10 Sound
5/10 Spielmechanik
3/10 Balancing
6/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Frustrierend, aber gut. 

[h1][b]6/10 Gesamtwertung

review:
Why in the world does this game have mostly positive reviews... what are people seeing in this. Are all the reviewers friends of the developers (or the devs themselves? 

In all honesty, this is simply very poor - the movement of the character is floaty, the hitboxes are vague, etc. etc. Overall, it does not feel good to play. There are several free games on Steam that are much much better than this... 

This might be interesting to people only because so few people bother to play it, so you can get some "rare" achievements, without that much effort....

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6659, 'last_played': 1650167628}
review:
这是一款第一人称射击游戏，玩家在游戏中将扮演一名士兵，参与各种战斗任务。然而尽管游戏的设定具有一定的吸引力，但在实际体验中，它却存在许多不足之处。

1. 画面表现较差
游戏的画面质量较差，纹理和模型细节的处理不够精细，导致整体画面效果较为粗糙。游戏的场景设计也相对简单，缺乏吸引力。

2. 游戏操作不流畅
游戏中的操作感不够流畅，射击和移动感觉不够自然。士兵的动作和反应不够自然，这影响了游戏的真实战斗体验。

3. 游戏内容单一
游戏提供了多种战斗任务，但在实际游戏中，这些任务的差异并不明显，缺乏多样性和挑战性。玩家很快就会发现游戏的战斗内容过于单一，缺乏吸引力。

4. 敌人AI低下
游戏中的敌人AI较低，敌人的行为模式较为简单，缺乏智能性。敌人往往只能按照固定的路径移动，且攻击方式单一，缺乏挑战性。

5. 优化不足
游戏的优化存在明显问题，运行过程中会出现卡顿和性能问题。这些问题影响了游戏的流畅度，降低了游戏体验。

综上所述，在画面、游戏操作、游戏内容、敌人AI和优化等方面都存在一定的问题。对于一款第一人称射击游戏来说，它无法提供令人满意的体验。我建议感兴趣的玩家在购买前先进行深入了解和考虑，以免失望。

review:
To be honest, I don't quite know why this game has so many bad reviews. I may have played it for only 52 minutes so far, and it's quite fun and all. I mean, of course it has it's ups and downs, but again, in my opinion it's a pretty cool, fun, and hard indie game, with an alright story.

Also, it costs like 2 dollars, what did y'all expect? Of course it won't be as good as some newly released game that costs over 50-100 dollars. But prices aside, it's quite fun as I already said.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049498441', 'num_games_owned': 5263, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1602147209}
review:
장점
-그렇게 어렵지도 않고 쉽지도 않음
-컨셉은 좀 유치한데 그래도 그냥 게임 형태는 유지하고 있음
-트레이딩카드가 있는게 신기함

단점
-동굴부분에 박쥐 겁나 찍찍거리는거 들을 수 있음 계속 찍찍거림 계속 계속 계속
-공포 요소 넣는답시고 귀신이나 유령이 나오는데
유령이 계속 자장가 부름.(허쉬 리틀 베이비 그거) 계속 반복됨 계속 계속 계속
-플렛포머 하는 중에 짜증나는 구간 좀 많이 있음
-생각보다 캐릭터 더블점프랑 점프가 미끌거리고 애매한 판정이 계속 생김
-버튼 누르는건 어렵지 않지만 많이 돌아가야하는 구간 많음
-검은색 떡칠해놔서 맵이 정말 어디가 장식이고 어디가 천장인지 모르겠음
-총알 겁나 작은데 히트박스는 정확하게 맞아야해서 적 죽이는거 힘듬. 총알은 맵에도 있지만 보석으로 사야함.
-목숨 보석으로 사면 죽었을 때 그 자리에서 부활 가능 아니면 체크포인트에서 시작해야함.
-2랜드에서 막혔는데 아이템같은거 다 써서 더 이상 진행이 불가능함.
게임이 체크포인트에서 불러내는것만 가능하고 캐릭터 아이템은
체크 포인트 전으로 돌리는거 불가능하기 때문에 한번 애매한 곳에서 막히면 게임 진행 불가능.
-위의 이유가 겁나 게임 자체를 방해하는데 보석이 왜 필요한건지 모르겠음
-몬스터 디자인이 옛날 코모도어 게임 처럼 좀 유치한편임 특히 랜드 2 가면 이게 옛날 슈퍼 패미콤 할로윈인지 헷갈림.
-보스 이름이 데몬 킹임
-랜드 이름이 동굴, 오싹한 곳, 정글임

author: {'steamid': '76561198974547702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1601134909}
review:
Скажу так - игра сделана не очень. Прыжки неудобные, высокая сложность...
Но атмосфера, попытки в интересный сюжет, жуткие моменты...все это делают игру немного, но интереснее.
Жуткий платформер, который если бы его доработали стал бы лучше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058146837', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1579432761}
review:
С первого уровня игра вызывает отвращение,  визуальный стиль, управление, звуковое сопровождение. Кто то пишет что игра "жуткая",  "страшная", "мрачная", "интересная"... вы серьёзно, сколько вам заплатили? Игра  ни чем не цепляет, она пустая. Сюжет я вообще не почувствовал. 
В игре отсутствуют настройки из-за чего нет возможности настроить под своё разрешение экрана и  в оконном режиме не открывается. Из плюсов разве что карточки дают, хотя учитывая стоимость игры оно того не стоит.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985969658', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 690, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1550804276}
review: Absolutely rubbish platformer. You run around these similar looking dark levels with random figures flying around hitting switches without much of a story. The main problem is the one thing that should be good, the platforming. You run around these big open levels with long platforms and environments to reach, with a ton of backtracking, but your guy walks like he's stuck in quicksand. Theres no run option, and it was so bad I thought i was getting FPS drop, which the computer read at 25 fps, but when I'd shoot or anything else would occur it would be normal so it was clear they just made it that way to take longer. Also when you jump its super slow and u float up in the air for 5s like you're a balloon, which is annoying to wait for your guy to come down. Also the double jump is horribly designed and if you press it twice you don't get high, you have to time it perfectly and jump at the exact height of the second jump which takes a while and is hard to judge due to how floaty the jumping is. If you don't time it perfect, which doesn't matter in most good platformers, you can't make most of the desired jumps. I died a couple times and gave up since i dreaded running back so slowly through the same parts backtracking while going slower than most turtles, which could have been easily avoided. 3.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099118861', 'num_games_owned': 867, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1523792289}
review:
Вполне неплохой платформер с жутковатой атмосферой: Бегаем по платформам, собираем кристалы, решаем головоломки, убиваем враждебных НПС и боссов.
[h1]Сюжет:[/h1] История отца, который в поисках сына преодолевает разнообразные препятствия.
Присутствует несколько типов карт: Пещеры, Жуткий Лес и Джунгли.
Так же есть семь многопользовательских режимов(о которых можно почитать в описании игры)

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
~Атмосфера самой игры отличная, мрачные карты с ужасными звуками.
~Хорошо прорисованны карты, с красивым и интересным задним фоном.
~Присутствуют головоломки и ловушки дабы разнообразить геймплей.
~Встречаются как и злые, так и добрые НПС с которым персонаж вступает в диалог, но и о боссах не забываем.
~Присутствует некая "торговля" подойдя к табличкам можно прикупить боезапас или "гемы" с помощью которых можно возродиться, валюта-белые кристалы.
~Мультиплеер поддерживающий до 4 игроков.

[h1]Минусов я не нашёл, даже придраться не к чему.[/h1]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1126011506
[b][u]Если понравился обзор оцените его, подписывайтесь на кураторов[/u][/b]
 [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/28776273/]Обзоры Онлайн[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198119714199', 'num_games_owned': 1747, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1527315318}
review:
É um jogo de gráficos simples, bem simples, feito através das sombras dos personagens, que de início me deixou com receio de jogar, o visual  apesar de gótico é extremamente simples, me fez desconfiar da qualidade do game até demais, mas ao jogar, reparei nos sons, principalmente dos fantasmas, as histórias, e os personagens que você conhece, pensaram em tudo, para te dar uma história completa, e vi que o jogo foi feito com vontade, algo hoje em dia considerado como mínimo para se tornar um bom jogo.

 Ao jogar um pouco mais, eu senti aquela fúria de quando joguei super meat boy pela primeira vez, quando você pensa não ter a capacidade de zerar aquela fase, e percebe não conseguir parar mais, visto que aquilo é um desafio pra você, o que também me remete aos clássicos do super nintendo que tinham muito essa marca. 

Eu recomendo, mais pela dificuldade, para os corajosos que gostam de jogos difíceis, e divirta-se com o pai alien em busca de seu filho,  e reparem nos batimentos cardíacos quando você está nas últimas, o jogo foi bem desenvolvido.

Recomendo como um game que demonstra que a empresa indie tem futuro, e pode lançar games com maior qualidade futuramente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1504520146}
review:
+ Grafik
+ Sound
+ gut mit einem Controller spielbar
+ Boss Gegner
+ süße kleine "Story"
+ Multiplayer Modus (Hotseat) mit vielen Modis 
+ während der Einzelspieler Levels kann man Secret Orte finden
- schwer, gerade die Boss Gegner... 
- keine Checkpoints (es gibt nur grüne Edelsteine um nach dem Sterben wieder an dem Punkt zurück zu kommen. Die sind aber sehr schnell aufgebraucht und man muss dadurch ein Level komplett lebend schaffen)


Teilweise ist es etwas unfair, dennoch für Leute die gerne schwere Spiele spielen interessant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127626301', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1588476203}

author: {'steamid': '76561198063725672', 'num_games_owned': 10107, 'num_reviews': 458, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1498778301}
review:
В положительных обзорах снова знакомые лица, которые расхваливают лишь самые отвратительные игры в стиме, что дает уже первое впечатление - и оно не обмануло.  Fallen как игра - совершенно не цепляет, не вызывает интереса и желания в неё играть уже с первых секунд. Все элементы игры, будь то графика, звук - аналогично не вызывают совершенно никаких эмоций.   
Выпускать посредственный инди-платформер (когда стим наводнили ТЫСЯЧИ подобных), "без души" (назовем это так), чего-то кардинально нового, захватывающее своей механикой/сюжетом и не отпускало бы до финальных титров - это довольно глупая затея. 

Возможно кто-нибудь и когда-нибудь одолеет эту игру, но фанатов у неё априори не будет.

[spoiler]А, еще можно на меня подписаться в качестве steam куратора :3
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6857971-FanSH-Games/ [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198017568860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1486833629}
review: Je n'ai joué que très peu de temps, je n'ai donc pas un avis objectif. Mais bon, l'histoire de l'alien qui va à la recherche de son fils tombé dans une caverne et qui croise des revenants toutes les 2 secondes ça ne m'a pas passionné. On notera pêle-mêle : les plateformes qui avancent lentement, l'ambiance "creepy" au rabais, certains mobs qui disparaissent instantanément au contact d'un projectile, une chanson dont la lecture est lancée par la position du perso et qui donne quelque chose de ridicule si on se déplace de quelques pixels de gauche à droite à cet endroit... Bref, si j'ai déjà tous ces griefs en quelques minutes, je ne vais pas me forcer à jouer plus longtemps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037032156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 933, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 933, 'last_played': 1492045115}
review:
Preview negative review:

Ok, I played until the 4th level, mainly because I love platformers.

The good:

- It's a platformer.
- It has a kind of interesting story.
- The music sets a good atmosphere (for a while)

The bad:

- You can't skip dialogs or "cut-scenes" (extremely frustrating if you are repeating a level because you died)
- There are some platforms that are unnecessarily slow, and if you fall you have to wait a lot to get back in.
- The buy mechanic is interesting game-wise, but at the same time it feels lazy, because who are you buying the things from. At the beginning it just says: Press S to buy. The gems have also no story.
- The names are way too generic and not very well thought out. Demon King. Charlie. Also *SPOILER AHEAD* not very much emotion when you find your kid.
- Too much backtracking when you light on a switch.
- Hit box of the bats is annoying.
- Nothing new towards the course of the first 4 levels.
- The ghosts are very annoying to deal with, they are too fast and out of nowhere sometimes.
- I got to the 4th level, died, run out of green gems, tried it again, couldn't skip dialogs, died again, quit. Not because I quit games (I got almost of the achievements in super meat boy and dark souls 1), but because it wasn't much fun.
- Enemies can damage you even if you kill them before the visually touch you.
- There's a glitch where you just slide.
- The world is unnecessarily dark and sometimes you can't distinguish enemies or things that hurt.
- Dialogs are not very well written, grammar wise.

I would love to play a polished version of this game. Don't recommend it right now for that price.

Updated Review:

I have changed my review from negative to positive because the dev has been making good updates and decided not to abandon the game.

Collision problems are mostly solved, dialog scenes are now skippable, movement feels smother, soundtracks are good, story is kind of interesting once you beat the game, achievementes are now attainable and not frustrating impossible levels (Death race).

Overall a nice little platformer that has a new mechanic (buying bullets and extra lifes in game).

author: {'steamid': '76561197992625648', 'num_games_owned': 11695, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1493642313}
review: It's a simple game, but is very fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198261583880', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1482322661}
review:
写在前面的话：不推荐。
玩这款游戏的初衷是因为steam上的宣传截图，场景设计十分吸引人，但进到游戏之后发现和预期不同。
首先是画面，实际画面并没有宣传图片上的惊艳，加上地图障碍和摆设都是黑漆漆的一团，有时候并不能分辨哪些是摆设哪些是障碍。
其次游戏并没有任何引导，虽然以地图摆设的形式在第一关设置了告示牌，但基本上除了按两下上可以二段跳以外，并没有把游戏必要的要素说明清楚，以至于到放弃这个游戏时我也不知道为什么发射子弹boss不会受到伤害。
最后，如果冲着“父亲要救儿子好感动啊”的同学可以离开了，因为父亲是个外星人……

author: {'steamid': '76561198060870336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1505045181}
review:
Перед покупкой я рекомендую ознакомиться с демо-версией игры.

Визуально Fallen напоминает нечто среднее между Limbo и Knytt Underground. Сюжет тоже мало чем выделяться на фоне современных платформеров. Но сама игра при этом довольно необычна и способна удивить. Она очень мрачная. В игре присутствуют скримеры, точнее внезапные звуковые и визуальные эффекты, которые первый раз могут испугать. Огромное внимание уделено мелким деталям — летучие мыши если их потревожить шипят, капли капают, лепестки летают. При этом в игре есть еще и элементы головоломки — поэтому есть над чем подумать. Надо сказать что ошибки игра не прощает и предлагает начать прохождение локации заново. Cкинул блок вниз? Жми на R. Забыл взять кристаллы наверху? Жми на R. 

[b]Но минусов в игре тоже много. Играть некомфортно и неудобно.[/b] Передвижение персонажа какое то слишком уж свободное и легкое, отсюда плохой контроль прыжков. Чрезмерная простота локаций. И пожалуй главное — техническая часть, в особенности реализация меню. Она плохая. Это проект любительского уровня с кучей проблем и запоминается он лишь атмосферой и тем, что в нем много интересных деталей. [b]Но играть в это тяжело.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1490478061}
review:
Данная игра является платформером с элементами головоломки. Играть будем за зеленоглазого человечка или не человечка, но похожего на него. Вроде как инопланетянин прилетевший на летающей тарелке, а тут аборигены начали всех братьев xyяpить, и спастись удалось только вам. Попадаем в темные и страшные лабиринты населенные всякой нечистью, вот от туда вам и нужно выбраться. Но это не так просто, нужно найти кнопочки, открывающие двери, не попасть в капкан, и не быть расплющеным каким нибудь камнем, падающим с верха. Так же не забываем собирать кристалы, они вам дадут патроны и возможно продолжить игру с того места где нас зaпи3дячили.

Очень понравилось динамичное озвучивание игры, здесь все просто супер, графика то же не подвела. Сам геплей интересен, и местами заставляет подумать.
